dev_notes: Pokéwalker with events can give pokemons. but those pokemons are obtainable in other games normally.
todo: say somewhere that event giving pokemons obtainable with non discontinued event are not listed
guide: Play Pokémon Platinum with an even Trainer ID, with starter Piplup for maximum accessories. Obtain all possible elements using only that game.
-The most time-consuming task is obtaining the Red Crystal, which requires finding 100 Fossils or Rare Bones in the Underground.
-Battle Facilities guides/tools: Documentation
-Obtain exclusive elements with GBA dual-slot.
-Obtain Globe decoration and World Ability Ribbon from online play (Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection).
Play Pokémon Pearl JP until accessing the Battle Frontier for Pair Ability Ribbon.
Play Pokémon Diamond until reaching Hearthome City for Overripe Poffin.
-Get Overripe Poffin using Platinum, Diamond and Pearl JP.
-Transfer 999 Pokémon to My Pokémon Ranch to obtain Phione and Mew.
Play HeartGold until defeating Red for Legend Ribbon. Obtain all Data Card from Pokéathlon Dome.
-Do a Battle Tower link multi battle using Platinum and HeartGold.
Play Pokémon Ranger until beating the game. Complete the special mission "Recover the Precious Egg!" to transfer Manaphy to Pokémon Platinum.
Play Pokémon Ruby until unlocking Mystery Gift (by defeating Petalburg Gym) for Enigma Berry and to transfer Eon Ticket to Emerald.
Play Emerald until accessing the Battle Facilities for ribbons and Starf Berry. Obtain Soul Dew with Eon Ticket.
-Alternatively, get Starf Berry and Soul Dew from Pokémon Battle Revolution.
Play Pokémon Ruby JP until being able to trade.

Play Pokémon Colosseum JP until purifying all 48 shadow Pokémon. Obtain Celebi from Pokémon Colosseum Bonus Disc JP, on your Pokémon Ruby JP game then transfer it to Pokémon Emerald then Platinum. Beat Mt Battle Story-Mode for Earth Ribbon. Get enough Coupons for Apicot Berry and Petaya Berry.
Play Pokémon Colosseum Bonus Disc US to get Jirachi on Pokémon Ruby.
Play Pokémon Colosseum Bonus Disc US for Jirachi again on a new Pokémon Ruby game until obtaining both Salac Berry and Ganlon Berry from Jirachi.
Obtain all event-exclusive elements on Platinum, Pearl JP, Emerald.
Check Generation IV Version Compability Page
